sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Best Buy ( BBY ) topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 5.2%.
Year to date, Best Buy has lost about 8.8% of its value.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is NetApp ( NTAP ), trading down 11.4%.
NetApp is lower by about 24.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Allegheny Technologies ( ATI ), trading down 2.1%, and Salesforce.com ( CRM ), trading up 4.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
